content.raw:
Ok so I noticed something strange under mac with both PyQt4 and PyQt5 in BLACS with the new Tabs. I haven't checked on windows yet.
If you drag the tabs once everything works just fine. But if you then drag any tab after that dragging will stop after less then a second.
![bug.gif](data/bitbucket.org/repo/xg9BdE/images/1467006556-bug.gif)

This only happens in BLACS and only 90% of the time and I have no clue on why/when it is happening.
